name: Head
template:
<meta charset="UTF-8">
    <link rel="icon" href="/img/favicon.ico?v=4" type="image/x-icon"/>
    <title>{{payload.title}}</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/css/bootstrap.css"/>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/jquery/jquery-ui.css"/>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/jquery/jquery-ui-timepicker-addon.css"/>
    <script src="/jquery/jquery.js"></script>
    <script src="/jquery/jquery-ui.js"></script>
    <script src="/jquery/jquery-ui-timepicker-addon.js"></script>
    <script src="/scripts/plotly-latest.min.js"></script>
{{{payload.extraScripts}}}
    <style>
{{{payload.css}}}
    </style>
    <style>
{{{payload.extraCss}}}
    </style>
    <script>
{{{payload.utilityScripts}}}
    </script>
    <script>
{{{payload.javascript}}}
    </script>

name: Utility Scripts
Get project name and userID
html.websocket
template:
Web Socket Status

Websocket Status Closed

name: IP filter
Save tray config in Memory
Init flow Variables
Save Settings to File
func:
var jsonPretty = JSON.stringify(global.get('tray'),null,2);
return {topic: msg.payload, payload:jsonPretty};

name: Filter MQTT
func: return {topic:msg.topic.split('/')[4], payload:msg.payload};

name: Publish tray
Save config file
Continue Tray readings
func:
global.set('settingInProgress',false)
return msg;

name: Archive Pulse
Save flow env variables
func:
global.set(msg.topic,msg.payload);
return null;

name: Get pm2Name
func:
msg.payload = global.get("pm2Name");
return msg;

name: Single Archive Pulse
func: return {topic:'archivePulse', payload:true};

name: Save global env variables
func:
global.set(msg.topic,msg.payload);
return null;

name: Pause Readings
func:
global.set('settingInProgress',true)
return msg;

name: Publish tray
Create Setting
Build Canvas
Shift payload
func: return msg.payload;

name: Test success
Increment watchdog
